text.text:
:tada: *Feature Release: Introducing Thoughtful Thursdays!* :tropical_fish::spiral_calendar_pad: 
Every Thursday at 10:00 AM EST, Nemo will pose thought-provoking questions in the general Slack channel to spark fun conversations.

:tada: *Feature Release: Introducing Shuffl, our Social Mixer Bot!* :robot_face::game_die: Every other week (Mondays at 10 AM), Shuffl will shuffle participants into groups of three via direct messages, creating opportunities for warm introductions and captivating story-sharing through Shuffl Bios and Intros. Join the #coffee-chats channel to participate in the action!

:mega: *Feature Release: Introducing the Suggestion Box Feature!* :package::sparkles: 
A platform for community members to share their ideas and ensure that everyone's voice is heard. By using simple slash commands such as `/suggestion-study`, `/suggestion-social`, or `/suggestion-other`, you can submit your suggestions, which will be reviewed by the dedicated team of admins.
:printer: *Sabre Printers* are no longer catching on fire! The newest version of our printers are safe to use. Make sure to tell your customers today.

Please join me in welcoming our 3 *new hires* to the Paper Company family! 

 *Robert California*, CEO 

 *Ryan Howard*, Temp 

 *Erin Hannon*, Receptionist

elements.text: :pushpin: Do you have something to include in the newsletter? Here's *how to submit content*.
